title: Introduction to Calculus
description: This course introduces the fundamental concepts of calculus, including limits, derivatives, and integrals. It is designed for students who have completed high school algebra and trigonometry.

title: Introduction to Java Programming
description: This course provides an introduction to programming using the Java programming language. It covers basic programming concepts such as variables, control structures, and methods.

title: Art History: From Ancient to Contemporary
description: This course explores the history of art from ancient times to the present day. It covers major artistic movements and styles, as well as key artists and their works.

title: Intermediate Spanish Language and Culture
description: This course is designed for students who have completed introductory-level Spanish language courses. It focuses on building proficiency in speaking, listening, reading, and writing, as well as deepening understanding of Hispanic cultures.

title: Introduction to Psychology
description: This course provides an introduction to the scientific study of human behavior and mental processes. It covers major topics such as perception, cognition, emotion, development, and social influence.

title: Introduction to Web Development
description: This course introduces the basic concepts of web development, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It covers creating static web pages, styling them with CSS, and adding interactivity with JavaScript.

title: Introduction to Linguistics
description: This course provides an introduction to the scientific study of language. It covers major topics such as phonetics, phonology, morphology, syntax, semantics, and pragmatics.

title: Introduction to Astronomy
description: This course provides an introduction to the study of the universe and its contents. It covers topics such as the solar system, stars, galaxies, and cosmology.

title: Introduction to Fashion Design
description: This course introduces the fundamental concepts of fashion design, including drawing, pattern-making, and sewing.
